DOC.brief_title: Feasibility High Frequency QRS Analysis Patients With Acute Myocardial Infarction
DOC.detailed_description: Chest pain one leading reason hospital emergency department ( ED ) visit worldwide . In US , approximately 6 million people annually undergo evaluation ED acute chest pain . Despite wealth knowledge available acute coronary syndrome ( ACS ) , condition continue among difficult predict diagnose . Misdiagnoses may lead discharge patient ACS , admit well costly unnecessary hospitalization patient ACS . More 2/3 patient ACS unstable angina ( UA ) non-ST-elevation myocardial infarction ( NSTEMI ) . Conventional ECG low sensitivity le 50 % diagnosing condition . As initial ECG ED often non-diagnostic ACS patient , diagnosis ST-elevation myocardial infarction ( STEMI ) early stage may also difficult . Analysis high-frequency QRS component ( HFQRS ) , quantifies change depolarization phase cardiac cycle , previously report sensitive method detection demand ischemia . Preliminary study show HFQRS-derived index also identify supply ischemia cause prolonged balloon occlusion , transient ischemic episode patient chest pain .
